svg.text: SELECT appointments WHERE patientId = ? AND doctorId = ?
SELECT treatment WHERE id = ? AND doctorId = ?
SELECT routines WHERE isActive = 1 AND reminderEnabled = 1
SELECT treatments WHERE patientId = ? AND isActive = 1
SELECT routines WHERE patientId = ? AND isActive = 1
SELECT treatment WHERE id = ? AND doctorId = ?
UPDATE ARVTreatments SET IsActive = 0, EndDate = NOW()
SELECT adherence data with reminder acknowledgments
SELECT treatment notes and side effects
